item.title: Fast data transfer/sync using globus
item.description: About Globus Globus is a secure, reliable research data management service. It works as a bridge between the remote Endpoint and the local Endpoint, rather than the cloud. With Globus, subscribers can move, share, publish & discover data via a single interface â€“ whether your files live on a supercomputer, lab cluster, tape archive, public cloud or your laptop, you can manage this data from anywhere, using your existing identities, via just a web browser.
